means: 佛罗里达州的，佛罗里达州人的

list.abs: 这两双战鞋皆采用可反光的3M材质制成，并以蓝色和粉红色点缀作烘托，如此设计可谓洋溢着浓郁的南佛罗里达（South Floridian） …

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, Floridian Void was gloriously melancholic, laced throughout with swells of anguish and fragile, shimmering keys.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, Floridian Void was gloriously melancholic, laced throughout with swells of anguish and fragile, shimmering keys.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, Floridian Void was gloriously melancholic, laced throughout with swells of anguish and fragile, shimmering keys.
